name: Dungeons of Wrath
description:
Dungeons of Wrath is a small and quick dungeon crawler that I spent about 2 weeks on before finally getting uploaded on to here, it's still in the early stages with a couple bugs. 

Your aim is to find gold bars, destroy any enemies that will cross your path and level up. Only one exit if located in each dungeon, so keep your eyes open for any pits that will advance you to the next dungeon. There also a few golden rooms located throughout the dungeon, these require a golden key to unlock, which are located somewhere in the dungeon, but be careful, they are most likely surrounded by some enemies. 

Can you make it through this labyrinth with nothing but your trusty crossbow and your quick instincts? 

There's only one way to find out...
